text:
Summary of changes
\begin{tabular}{|c|c|c|c|c|c|c|}
  & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{Current settings} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{Proposed changes} \\
  \multirow[t]{9}{*}{Grant} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{KiwiSaver First Home Deposit Subsidy} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{HomeStart (existing home)} \\
  & KiwiSaver contributions & Single & Couple & KiwiSaver contributions & Single & Couple \\
  & 3 years & \$3,000 & \$6,000 & 3 years & \$3,000 & \$6,000 \\
  & 4 years & \$4,000 & \$8,000 & 4 years & \$4,000 & \$8,000 \\
  & 5 years & \$5,000 & \$10,000 & 5 years & \$5,000 & \$10,000 \\
  & & & & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{HomeStart (new home)} \\
  & & & & 3 years & \$6,000 & \$12,000 \\
  & & & & 4 years & \$8,000 & \$16,000 \\
  & & & & 5 years & \$10,000 & \$20,000 \\
  \multirow[t]{6}{*}{House price caps for grants and Welcome Home Loans} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{Auckland \$485,000} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{\$550,000} \\
  & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{Wellington \& Queenstown \$425,000} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{\multirow{4}{*}{\$450,000}} \\
  & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{Christchurch \& Selwyn District \$ 400,000} & & & \\
  & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{Hamilton, Tauranga, Western Bay of Plenty, Hutt City, Porirua, Tasman, Nelson \& Waimakariri \$ 350,000} & & & \\
  & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{Upper Hutt \& Kapiti Coast \$ 300,000} & & & \\
  & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{All other areas \$300,000} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{\$350,000} \\
  KiwiSaver First Home Withdrawal & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{The first home buyer can withdraw all funds except: - the member tax credit - the government's $\$ 1,000$ kick-start contribution} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{The first home buyer: - can withdraw the member tax credit} \\
  General eligibility criteria & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{The recipient must: - contributed to KiwiSaver for a minimum of three years - be a first home buyer - i.e. have not owned land or property before - live in the house for at least 6 months} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{No change} \\
  Extra criteria for grants & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{- not have received a grant before} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{No change} \\
  Extra criteria Welcome Home Loans & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{- have a deposit of 10 \% or more of the purchase price (including the grant)} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{No change} \\
  Income limits & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{\$80,000 for a single buyer} & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{\multirow[t]{2}{*}{No change}} \\
  for grants and Welcome Home Loans & \multicolumn{3}{|l|}{\$120,000 for 2+ buyers} & & & \\
 
\end{tabular}
